name: Hubitat
0:
”Alexa, turn off the kitchen lights”
”Alexa, lock the front door”
”Alexa, make the desk lamp blue”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You can now utilize Hubitat Elevation® to its fullest potential with Alexa!

The Hubitat Smart Home Skill for Alexa, lets you control any connected light, switch, dimmer, outlet, and door lock with your voice.

Example phrases are:
"Alexa, set the living room lamp to 20 percent"
"Alexa, set the hallway lights to cool white"
"Alexa, brighten the bedroom lights"
"Alexa, dim the living room"
"Alexa, set the kitchen light to 50"
"Alexa, change the bathroom light to blue"
"Alexa, is the front door locked?"
"Alexa, [lock / unlock] the back door" (Unlocking is now supported by creating a voice code in the Alexa app)

To get started simply click the "Enable" button for this skill and log into your Hubitat account. Then select your Hub name and the devices you would like to have Alexa control. You can also select all, and only currently compatible devices will be enabled.

Hubitat Elevation® Hub and account is required. If you don't have Hubitat yet, you can purchase one at https://hubitat.com
